entry.title: First post using Pelican
entry.summary:
Hello!

Welcome on another boring blog! Generally I don't think too many people will be reading this stuff, but this is the first time that I'm trying to write something.

Behind the scenes

This blog is generated by Pelican - static blog generator written in python. Firstly I would like to say thanks for nice work! It was really a pleasure to generate one using this stuff.

<?php function foo() { echo 'bar';} ?>

entry.title: Something about me
entry.summary:
Boring stuff about me

Piotr Deszyński

placeholder for image ;)

Yup that's me. Or at least there will be me. I'm waiting for some picture that can be used here. But who am I? Yet another boring programmer, who loves sitting down nearby his computer and dive into different stuff. Sadly (or rather this is my big luck) I have a wife which doesn't allow me to sit and work too much. So basically I'm always having problem with time. Right now I'm working in company named Red Sky. Don't know if you heard about it thought... maybe you heard about Filestube... Still nothing? I'm working here mostly on webdevel. Using PHP, Javascript, Python, C++ and sometimes Java.

I think that for some time this page might be empty (I'm not a person that likes to showoff with certs or smth).
